thread.title: ‘Lula’ Campaign Buses Hit by Gunfire, Brazil’s Workers’ Party Says - WSJ

author: Samantha Pearson
title: ‘Lula’ Campaign Buses Hit by Gunfire, Brazil’s Workers’ Party Says - WSJ

organizations.name: workers’ party says - wsj são paulo

text:
SÃO PAULO—Buses carrying supporters of former Brazilian President Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva were hit by gunfire late Tuesday, his Workers’ Party said, ahead of a court ruling on whether to send the leftist icon to jail for corruption. No one was hurt.

The Workers’ Party said two buses were hit in the southern state of Paraná where Mr. da Silva has been rallying support for his presidential campaign. The Workers’ Party posted a photo on its website of one of its buses perforated by a bullet hole. Local police officials didn’t...
